description.en:
A serialized work in "Weekly Manga Goraku'' in 1994.
The main character is a legendary man in the Ura golf world, the total number Gakuran golfer Eagle is the only life!
The attacking opponents include the low-current machine "Golcop'', the strongest lady ``Kureni Yuuko'', the descendants of Kaga's Maemizu clan ninjas, and the survival golfer Tarzan... a fierce game with no rules. A series of extremely dangerous matches!
120% pleasure satisfaction! It's so fun, it's truly out of the ordinary, and it's an explosion
of manga power!
"I hope that readers who read this work will not do the same thing at the golf course
(by Tomoo Kimura)"
The unpublished work is finally available in electronic form ! Limited to Densho Bato, comes with an afterword written by Tomoo Kimura

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/学ランゴルファー鷲-木村-知夫-ebook/dp/B07QJVZPTP

biography.en:
**Native name**: 木村知夫

Not to be confused with [Kimura Tomoe (木村巴)](https://mangadex.org/author/f62a6bcc-2ecd-4278-8522-741247e1ccdb), the Shoujo author sharing the same romaji name.

**Native name**: 木村知夫

Not to be confused with [Kimura Tomoe (木村巴)](https://mangadex.org/author/f62a6bcc-2ecd-4278-8522-741247e1ccdb), the Shoujo author sharing the same romaji name.
